sentences.en: ‘Do you ever wish you were back in Japan?’ ‘Sometimes. Not very often.’
sentences.cn: “你有没有想过希望回到日本？”“有时候吧，但不经常这么想。”

sentences.en: "Well," he conceded, "I do sometimes mumble a bit."
sentences.cn: “嗯，”他承认道，“我有时候说话的确有点吐字不清。”

sentences.en: Although sometimes I feel like bothering, as often as not I don't.
sentences.cn: 虽然我有时会觉得这是在找麻烦，但是通常并不会这样。

sentences.en: He told some lies and sometimes just embroidered the truth.
sentences.cn: 他说了些谎，有时只是对事实添油加醋了一番。

sentences.en: I sometimes have to work late.
Jane's always annoying her and she takes it out on me sometimes.
sentences.cn: 简老是惹她生气，她有时就拿我出气。

sentences.en: Sometimes they just drive slowly down the lane enjoying the scenery.
sentences.cn: 有时他们只是沿着小路慢慢地开车，欣赏两旁的风景。

sentences.en: Sometimes things don't turn out the way we think they're going to.
sentences.cn: 有时事情并不像我们认为的那样发展。

sentences.en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
sentences.cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

sentences.en: Sometimes, Grandma would tell us stories about her childhood in Italy.
sentences.cn: 有时候，祖母会跟我们讲讲她儿时在意大利的经历。

sentences.en: Sometimes, the bank manager just doesn't see it your way.
sentences.cn: 有时银行经理和你看问题的角度就是不一样。

sentences.en: The journey takes an hour, sometimes even longer.
sentences.cn: 路上需要一小时，有时甚至更长。

sentences.en: The stores are sometimes sold out of certain groceries.
sentences.cn: 有时商店里的某些杂货会有脱销的现象。

sentences.en: The tone of the book is sometimes too flip.
sentences.cn: 这本书的笔调有些时候太不严肃了。

sentences.en: This very careful attitude to money can sometimes border on meanness.
sentences.cn: 这种对待金钱的过分谨慎的态度有时几近于吝啬。

sentences.en: Tom admits that playing video games sometimes distracts him from his homework.
sentences.cn: 汤姆承认玩电子游戏有时会使他无心做作业。

sentences.en: What I said sometimes didn't register in her brain.
sentences.cn: 有时我说的话她根本没听进去。

sentences.en: Women are sometimes seen to be less effective as managers.
sentences.cn: 女性有时被认为不善于管理。

sentences.en: You must have noticed how tired he sometimes looks.
sentences.cn: 你一定注意到他有时候显得特别疲惫。

trans.tran_en: on some occasions but not always
on some occasions but not always
